title: Need 1800 Location's Populations Noted and separated into One of 3 categories (Low, Medium, High)
snippet:
Looking for project to be done ASAP ideally 2 days at the most.

I have a list that includes the City, State, and Zip Code... Not Just USA. There are two empty columns, Population and (L/M/H):
Low = 0 - 250,000
Medium = 250,000 - 500,000
High = 500,000 +

I need the population filled out as accurately as possible, and also the location letter description on the same row (l/m/h)

Only 2 columns, very easy job.. shouldnt take longer than a day if you work diligently.
